definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
lit. things are not separated according to their size (idiom)/fig. to deal with any matter, regardless of its importance
cytomegalovirus retinitis, a disease of the retina that can lead to blindness/CMV retinitis
pinyin: ju4 xi4 bao1 bing4 du2 shi4 wang3 mo2 yan2

sentences.english: The great arises out of small things that are honored and cared for.
sentences.chinese: 事无巨细，任何大事都是由一系列的小事组成的。

sentences.english: The treatment of benign giant cell tumors is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 良性巨细胞瘤的治疗争议比较大。

sentences.english: They said not to cover everything about Gary Locke.
sentences.chinese: 他们说对于骆家辉的报道不要事无巨细。

sentences.english: All giant cell tumors appear to be located at or near the foramen of Monro.
sentences.chinese: 所有的巨细胞瘤均位于或者临近孟氏孔。

sentences.english: This is cytomegalovirus infection in the lung.
sentences.chinese: 这是肺巨细胞病毒感染。

sentences.english: Human cytomegalovirus(HCMV) is the most frequent congenitally infected virus.
sentences.chinese: 人巨细胞病毒是人类最常见的先天性感染病毒。

sentences.english: Conclusion CMV infection is related to coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论巨细胞病毒感染与冠心病之间关系密切。

sentences.english: They are best imagined as roughly the size of your hand.
sentences.chinese: 它们的巨细最佳想象成约莫与你的手同样大。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical and imaging features of bony giant-cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨巨细胞瘤的临床特点和影像学特征。

sentences.english: We can offer a discount in progressive stages according to the size of the order.
sentences.chinese: 按照订购数目的巨细，我们可供给乏进的扣头。

sentences.english: They are suffering from "everything is important" syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 他们正经受“事无巨细”综合症的困扰。

sentences.english: The inset demonstrates a typical giant cell with a round, pink intracytoplasmic inclusion.
sentences.chinese: 插图显示典型的巨细胞，圆形，有粉红色胞质包涵体。

sentences.english: Subependymal giant cell astrocytomas develop in 15% of patients with tuberous sclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 的结节硬化病人可以发生室管膜下巨细胞星形细胞瘤。

sentences.english: White matter lesions are clusters of heterotopic giant cells, similar to those found in tubers .
sentences.chinese: 白质病变是成簇的异位的巨细胞，与结节里面的类似。

sentences.english: The side pockets are sized to hold one-liter water bottles.
sentences.chinese: 侧面口袋巨细进行一公升水的瓶子。

sentences.english: Research of imaging diagnosis on giant cell tumor of uneven boneDAI Shi-lin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不规则骨骨巨细胞瘤影像表现及鉴别诊断。

definition: see 事無巨細|事无巨细[shi4 wu2 ju4 xi4]
lit. things are not separated according to their size (idiom)/fig. to deal with any matter, regardless of its importance
dimension/magnitude/size/measurement/large and small/at any rate/adults and children/consideration of seniority
severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
no matter how big or small/not distinguishing junior and senior
